oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ixa-pipe-ned-ukb
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
ixa-pipe-ned-ukb is a multilingual Named Entity Disambiguation tool.
It is based on UKB (http://ixa2.si.ehu.es/ukb/), a graph-based Word Sense Disambiguation tool. The Wikipedia graph built from the hyperlinks between Wikipedia articles is used for the processing.
The input of the tool is text where named entity mentions have been recognized and represented using the Natural Language Processing Annotation Format (NAF) (http://wordpress.let.vupr.nl/naf/. In the output it returns the corresponding Wikipedia articles for the entities in NAF format.
This tool is partly funded by the European Commission project QTLeap FP7-ICT-2013.4.1-610516 (http://qtleap.eu). This tool is distributed under the license GPL v3.0.
